Article Title: 'You start your innings on zero': Smriti Mandhana's old comment goes viral after wedding with Palash Muchhal is cancelled
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana and Palash Muchhal (Image credit: Instagram)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Tom Kohler-Cadmore: ‘If I Middle It, It’s probably a six!’ | Power-Hitting Mindset Explained

NEW DELHI: Smriti Mandhana ’s old motivational words have resurfaced online after she and music composer Palash Muchhal announced that their wedding has been called off. The resurfaced clip, from an interview with Humans of Bombay, shows the India vice-captain speaking about how she deals with difficult phases in life, something fans feel resonates strongly with her current situation.In the interview recorded three years ago, Mandhana opened up about her journey in cricket, navigating expectations and criticism, and building resilience. She revealed that her coping mechanism is rooted in simplicity and routine rather than overthinking setbacks.She explained, “It's pretty easy for me. I have short-term goals. Say if I feel low today, I will just start writing what I have to work on for the next six days or for the next seven days, in my batting or in my fitness. So once I start doing that, I just forget what's happening. I just focus on what I have to do.”Mandhana added that shifting her focus to what lies ahead helps her regain motivation.“So when I change my headspace into what I have to do in the next 6-7 days, I don't know, I just feel like there's so much to look forward to,” she said.Reflecting on her evolution from a young aspiring cricketer to one of the most recognised faces in women’s cricket, Mandhana said the sport has shaped her personality and approach to life.“You have to always start your day as a new day because you start your innings on zero, even if you score a hundred,” she shared.She added, “So that's the biggest takeaway from what I have learnt. Whatever happens in your life the next day is a fresh day.”On Sunday, Mandhana finally addressed the speculation around her personal life, confirming that the wedding with Palash Muchhal had been "called off." In her statement, she wrote, "I need to clarify that the wedding is called off. I would like to close this matter here and implore all of you to do the same."Calling herself a “very private person,” Mandhana urged fans and the media to "respect the privacy of both families" and allow them the space to move on.Looking ahead, Mandhana emphasised her commitment to the sport, saying, "I believe there is a higher purpose driving us all and for me that has always been representing my country at the highest level. I hope to continue to play and win trophies for India for as long as possible."She ended her note with gratitude and closure: "Thank you for all your support. It's time to move forward."
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana's old motivational words have resurfaced online. The india vice-captain spoke about how she deals with difficult phases in life. She revealed that her coping mechanism is rooted in simplicity and routine. On sunday, she confirmed that the wedding with palash muchhal had been "called off"

Article Title: Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more
Article Text:
Serena Williams and Venus Williams combined net worth in 2025: Tennis sisters, earnings, endorsements, business, career and more (Image via Getty)

Serena Williams and Venus Williams net worth in 2025

Serena Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Venus Williams tennis earnings and prize money

Serena Williams endorsements and business work

Venus Williams endorsements and business work

Serena Williams and Venus Williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say Serena’s net worth is about 350 million dollars, and Venus’s net worth is about 90–95 million dollars. This means their combined net worth is around 440–445 million dollars. They make money from tennis, brand deals, business work, and smart investments. They stay very active even after many years in the sport.Forbes lists Serena Williams with a net worth of about 350 million dollars in 2025. This comes from her prize money, big brand deals, and her investment company.Business Insider reports that Venus Williams is worth 90–95 million dollars. When we put the numbers together, the sisters are worth 440–445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.Serena Williams won 23 Grand Slam singles titles, the most in modern women’s tennis. The WTA confirms she earned about 94.8 million dollars in prize money, which is the highest amount ever for a woman tennis player.Her long run at the top of the sport helped her build a very strong financial base that still grows today through her businesses.According to the WTA, Venus Williams has earned around 42 million dollars in prize money during her more than 30-year tennis career. She won 7 Grand Slam singles titles and many more in doubles with Serena. Her long time in the sport helped her earn steady money and build her own business path.Serena Williams has worked with Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, Rolex, Beats by Dre, and many more big brands. In 2025, she became a global ambassador for Ro, a major health company, which Ro confirmed on its official site.Serena also runs Serena Ventures, which has invested in 70–85 startups, including several unicorns worth more than 1 billion dollars. She also launched WYN Beauty and has a small stake in the new WNBA team in Toronto.Venus Williams has worked with brands like Nike, Gatorade, Wilson, and Porsche. She owns the activewear brand EleVen and her interior design company V Starr. Reports say these brands bring in strong money each year for her.In 2025, the tennis sisters also worked on a new video podcast set to release on X, giving fans a new way to see them together.Also Read: Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined net worth: Tennis earnings, endorsements, business, relationship and more
Article Summary: Serena williams and venus williams are two of the most famous sisters in sports. They are great tennis players and also very strong businesswomen. In 2025, trusted reports say serena’s net worth is about 350 million dollars. This means their combined networth is around 440–445 million dollars, making them one of the richest sister teams in world sports.

Article Title: Brittany Mahomes abruptly goes silent after Mahomes and Kelce’s meltdown shakes Chiefs’ season
Article Text:
Kansas City Chiefs faced a tough loss against the Houston Texans. Quarterback Patrick Mahomes and player Travis Kelce struggled on the field. Brittany Mahomes, wife of Patrick Mahomes, remained silent on social media after the game. This quiet response mirrored the disappointment felt by many fans. The team's playoff hopes are now uncertain.

Kelce struggles, Mahomes takes heat, and Brittany distances herself from the chaos

Brittany Mahomes has never been shy about showing love for the Kansas City Chiefs, especially when her husband Patrick Mahomes takes the field at Arrowhead Stadium. From stadium arrivals to postgame celebrations, her Instagram is often filled with glam snapshots, family moments, and behind-the-scenes excitement. But Sunday’s matchup against the Houston Texans brought a different kind of energy and this time Britney chose not to post at all.After the Chiefs’ 20–10 defeat, the atmosphere among fans turned tense, and the blame quickly fell on both Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce for their lackluster performance. Instead of sharing her usual reactions, Brittany went silent, leaving fans to interpret her disappointment without a word.Before kickoff, Brittany Mahomes seemed poised for another enthusiastic game day, sharing Instagram stories of the stadium buzz. Yet as the game unfolded, Kansas City faltered early and never recovered. Kelce dropped late-game opportunities and the offense struggled to find rhythm, a shock to a fan base accustomed to polished comebacks. Once the loss was sealed, Brittany’s social feed suddenly stopped. No postgame thoughts. No family shots. Just silence.This isn’t the first time her online presence has mirrored the team’s emotional highs and lows.When the Chiefs win, Brittany often floods social media with celebration. But when they lose, fans get nothing at all, a silent statement that speaks louder than her usual hype. Making the night even more unusual, she also wasn’t seen alongside Taylor Swift and Selena Gomez, who attended separately in support of Travis Kelce.With this defeat, Kansas City Chiefs suffers more than a bruised ego. Their playoff hopes are now hanging by a thread, and for the first time in nine seasons, they’ve lost the AFC West crown, a title now held by the Denver Broncos. Their next game against the Chargers could determine whether their season lives or dies.As frustration among supporters rises, Brittany’s silence reflects what many Chiefs fans are feeling: uncertainty. The once-unstoppable dynasty suddenly looks fragile, and if Mahomes and Kelce don’t turn things around fast, the quiet moment on Brittany’s Instagram may be the least of Kansas City’s worries.Also Read: Brittany Mahomes sends a clear message to fans as they question Patrick Mahomes’ legacy during tough season
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes has never been shy about showing love for the kansas city chiefs. Her instagram is often filled with glam snapshots, family moments, and behind-the-scenes excitement. But this time britney chose not to post at all. This quiet response mirrored the disappointment felt by many fans.

Article Title: Tee Higgins injury update: Bengals wide receiver enters concussion protocol, Week 15 status uncertain
Article Text:
Tee Higgins’ Week 15 status uncertain after concussion (Image via: Getty Images)

Tee Higgins Week 15 status: Concussion protocol updates and team outlook



‘Uncomfortable’ to watch Bengals’ Tee Higgins after head injury | Pro Football Talk | NFL on NBC

Cincinnati Bengals wide receiver Tee Higgins is back in the concussion protocol as the team heads into Week 15. After recently returning from a prior concussion, Higgins’ availability remains uncertain. While he played through Sunday’s high-scoring matchup against the Buffalo Bills, lingering health concerns have prompted the team to proceed cautiously.During the game, Higgins endured multiple hard hits to the head but cleared on-field concussion tests and was able to finish the contest. Post-game, however, he reported symptoms consistent with a concussion, leading to his return to the league’s concussion protocol. Updates on his condition are expected to emerge throughout the week as the team monitors his recovery.Head coach Zac Taylor confirmed that Higgins has re-entered the concussion protocol but did not provide a definitive update on his Week 15 availability. The Bengals will continue evaluating him closely, following strict NFL concussion guidelines that prioritize player health and full recovery. The first detailed update on Higgins’ status is expected Wednesday when Cincinnati releases its initial injury report for the week.Participation in limited practice would indicate progress, but nothing is guaranteed at this stage. The team has emphasized caution after Higgins’ recent concussion history, ensuring no risk is taken with his long-term health. How the Bengals adjust their offensive game plan may also depend on Higgins’ participation later in the week.This marks Higgins’ second concussion in recent weeks, which increases the likelihood that he could miss the upcoming matchup. His uncertain status could significantly impact the Bengals’ passing game, as other receivers may need to take on a larger role if Higgins is unable to play. Analysts and teams will be monitoring developments closely throughout the week to understand how Cincinnati may adjust its offensive strategy in his absence.For now, the Bengals are managing Higgins’ recovery carefully, ensuring he is fully cleared before returning to the field. Weekly updates will provide clarity on whether he can participate in practice or suit up for Sunday’s game, offering a clearer picture of the team’s offensive outlook without one of its key wide receivers.Also Read: Marvin Harrison Jr. injury update: Heel issue leaves Cardinals wide receiver’s week 15 return in doubt
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals wide receiver tee higgins is back in the concussion protocol. Higgins played through sunday’s high-scoring matchup against the buffalo bills. The team has emphasized caution after higgins’ recent concussion history, ensuring no risk is taken with his long-term health.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes’ limp fake? Chiefs supporters debate star QB's injury as playoff hopes fade after tough loss to Texans
Article Text: Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs suffered a disappointing 20-10 loss to the Houston Texans, dropping their record to 6-7. Mahomes' visible limp during the game sparked online speculation and accusations of faking the injury, despite him being listed with a knee issue prior. The team's struggles place their playoff hopes in jeopardy.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes' visible limp during the game sparked online speculation and accusations of faking the injury. The kansas city chiefs suffered a disappointing 20-10 loss to the houston texans, dropping their record to 6-7. The team's struggles place their playoff hopes in jeopardy.

Article Title: “I've wanted to punch them”: Stephen Curry’s wife Ayesha Curry opens up about the anger she feels when women try to pursue the NBA legend
Article Text:
Ayesha Curry opens up about women approaching Stephen Curry.(Image via Elsa/Getty Images)

Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, shares how she acts when women approach the star player





Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, blamed the show for the criticisms she had received over her comments





Stephen Curry, the Golden State Warriors’ star player, has been with his wife, Ayesha Curry , even before he was drafted in the NBA.While Stephen Curry is pretty private, Ayesha Curry is more public about the things that happen in her life. The popular entrepreneur had opened up about what she feels when women approach Stephen Curry.A few years ago, in 2019, Ayesha Curry appeared on the now cancelled, Jada Pinkett Smith‘s show, Red Table Talk, where she opened up about women approaching Stephen Curry.Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, said, "But there have been a couple of times, where I've wanted to punch somebody in the face for sure…”The popular entrepreneur added, “He can't see it coming, I see it from a mile away."Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, continued, "Stephen is very nice by nature…Everything is always very friendly, sometimes to the point where, 'I'm a grown woman,' so, I'll just insert myself and be like, 'Hello, how are you doing?'"She added that "the ladies will always be lurking, hoping for their moment and waiting."However, despite the fame and wealth, Stephen Curry has always remained deeply in love and committed to his wife, Ayesha Curry, and their beautiful children.Some of Ayesha Curry’s statements in the the now cancelled, Jada Pinkett Smith‘s show, Red Table Talk, had raised eyebrows then.In 2023, Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, opened up about the criticisms she had received for her comments and blamed Jada Pinkett Smith‘s show, Red Table Talk, for it.Ayesha Curry spoke to Business Insider about it and said, “It’s not what I said, and the context was weird…Yeah. I took that one personally.”The popular entrepreneur added, “When the social media thing started, nobody knew what that was going to become…If we had known back in the day just how chaotic it would make life, I don’t think we would’ve done it.”However, Ayesha Curry did not blame Jada Pinkett Smith directly for the outrage her comments had received and continues to be friendly with her today.Also Read: "Shattered my soul": Dwyane Wade's wife Gabrielle Union breaks silence on infertility struggles while the NBA legend had a child during their split
Article Summary: Ayesha curry opens up about women approaching stephen curry. The popular entrepreneur had opened up about what she feels when women approach the star player. She blamed the show, red table talk, for the criticisms she had received over her comments. However, ayesha did not blame jada pinkett smith directly for the outrage.

Article Title: RaKai slams QTCinderella after her insulting joke at The Streamer Awards 2025, calls the annual event “rigged”
Article Text:
RaKai (via Getty Images)

RaKai reacts to QTCinderella’s embarrassing joke and The Streamer Awards 2025 snub







The Twitch community is once again buzzing after popular streamer RaKai reacted strongly to a joke made about him by Blaire “QTCinderella” during The Streamer Awards 2025. The moment, which was meant to be lighthearted, quickly turned into a major online controversy after RaKai addressed it during a livestream.QTCinderella had teased several creators during a live segment at the awards. Her question to RaKai stood out and sparked mixed reactions online. Now, RaKai’s response and his claim that the awards were “rigged” have taken the drama even further.During The Streamer Awards 2025, QTCinderella asked RaKai a pointed question in front of a live audience. She said,“RaKai, a question - what’s the coolest thing you’ve ever stolen? Don’t answer! It’s a test! It’s a test, RaKai! Have you learned nothing?! Don’t answer. Don’t answer it! Take his mic. Take his mic. Yeah, no, he’s learned his lesson. He’s not allowed to answer that.”RaKai spoke about the moment during his livestream. The 16-year-old streamer shared how angry he felt at the time.While venting, he used harsh language and said, “You want to know what I was going to say? I was going to say, ‘Listen, bch, what’s the coolest dk you’ve ever sucked? Get the fk off my dk!’ That’s what I was going to say.Chat, I was going to say that st to her face, bro, in front of everybody. But I had to just… sit down and think. I’m Black, petite… and chill! I was going to say that st! I was going to be like, ‘Bch, what’s the coolest dk you’ve ever fking sucked?! You ugly bch,’ to her. I was going to say that. But I just calmed down, bro, you know? And, you know, see why she even said that s**t ’cause the whole time…”He later explained why he believed she made the joke. He linked it to a past incident where he was banned.In another clip from the same stream, RaKai also accused The Streamer Awards of being unfair after losing the Best Breakout Streamer award.He said, “But, nah, chat. I wouldn’t say this st is rigged, but… you feel me, bro? It’s just, like, bro… it’s fking rigged, bch! It’s fking rigged! How the fk didn’t I win?! How the fk?! It’s rigged! How the fk I didn’t win that st?! But, nah, look, though! W Adept! I had to look at myself…”So far, QTCinderella has not responded to RaKai’s remarks or made any comments on the outrageous incidents of the awards.Also Read: Is FaZe Clan’s reputation taking a blow? Stable Ronaldo believes their image is being “ruined” by homophobic and racist labels
Article Summary: Streamer rakai reacted strongly to a joke made about him by blaire "qtcinderella" during the streamer awards 2025. The moment, which was meant to be lighthearted, quickly turned into a major online controversy. Now, the 16-year-old streamer has claimed that the awards were "rigged"

Article Title: ‘Day-to-day’ or done for 2025? Where Drake London stands before Week 15 vs. Buccaneers
Article Text:
Drake London remains day-to-day with a PCL sprain as the Falcons enter Week 15 on a short week. (Image via Getty)

Drake London’s Week 15 status looks nothing like a player who is close to returning

What Drake London’s injury means for the Falcons’ offense and fantasy playoffs

Drake London has not played a snap since he crumpled to the turf in overtime of the Atlanta Falcons’ Week 11 loss to the Carolina Panthers with a knee injury. The team keeps calling him “day-to-day,” but the calendar, the injury report, and the standings are all saying something very different.With a short week before “Thursday Night Football” against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, every update on London has pointed in one direction. Another DNP, and a real chance that the franchise wideout is effectively done for 2025.The timeline on London’s knee has been messy from the start. He hurt it in overtime in Week 11 against Carolina after posting seven catches for 119 yards. He left that game and has not played since.Early on, the outlook was optimistic. ESPN’s Adam Schefter reported that the injury was not believed to be serious and that London might not miss time. NFL Network’s Ian Rapoport echoed that early read, noting that the Falcons’ WR had avoided major structural damage. Both reports came before the full picture was clear.Rapoport later reported that London had a sprained PCL and would miss at least Week 12. That diagnosis changed everything.PCL sprains usually come with recovery windows in the four-to-six-week range, and they tend to get worse when players try to rush back.Since that update, the pattern has been the same. London has missed three straight games. He has yet to log a single practice rep. He keeps landing on Atlanta’s injury reports as a non-participant.Jack McKessy of USA TODAY noted that London was listed as a DNP on the Falcons’ first Week 15 report, which was estimated because the team did not hold a full practice on Monday, Dec. 8. That was the fourth time in a row he appeared on the report with that same status since the injury.Head coach Raheem Morris has tried to keep the language positive. Ahead of Week 14, he told reporters that London had been upgraded to day-to-day and that he was feeling better and moving around more. On Monday of Week 15, Morris stuck to the same line, telling reporters, “Drake is still day-to-day.”The problem is that the tape on the week does not match the quote. London still has no real practice work. The team is on a short week. And Atlanta is already out of the playoff race.Tori McElhaney of AtlantaFalcons.com laid it out bluntly. In her Monday injury report breakdown, she wrote that she does not expect London to suit up this week, adding, “If London can get some practice reps, maybe he will be a true game-time decision. However, I think it is more likely the Falcons continue to shut him down this week and hope to get him back to 100% after the mini-bye.”Mike Moraitis also pointed out that the Falcons did not put London on injured reserve, which means they originally expected him to miss fewer than four games. That bet has already lost. He has missed three straight, is tracking toward a fourth, and nothing about his current workload suggests he is close.When you add in the context PFSN’s earlier fantasy breakdown highlighted, a PCL sprain, no practice at all, and a team with “dead playoff hopes”, the reality is simple. The “day-to-day” label is technical. The actual status is “unlikely to play,” and the conversation is quietly shifting from Week 15 to whether it makes any sense to risk him again before 2026.The reason this story will not go away is because London is not just any wideout on this depth chart. He is the passing game.Even after missing three games, London still leads the Falcons in almost every receiving category: targets, receiving yards, touchdowns, 20-plus-yard receptions, and first downs. Before the injury, he went over 100 yards in three straight outings and has 810 receiving yards and six touchdowns in nine games. That is 13.5 yards per catch and exactly 90 yards per game, which puts him on pace for back-to-back 1,000-yard seasons if he were healthy enough to finish.Without him, the receivers room looks thin. Darnell Mooney has slid into the WR1 role by default, but none of the reporting suggests the Falcons suddenly see him as a true replacement for London. Kyle Pitts and David Sills have seen more work as well, yet the offense has clearly lost its top mismatch on the outside.PFSN’s fantasy analysis has already treated this like a long-term problem, not a one-week blip. That breakdown pointed out that London stacked 651 yards and six touchdowns in his last six full games, cementing himself as a WR1 for fantasy managers. Losing that level of consistency in November and December is brutal in any format.The same piece also made the hard call most fantasy managers do not want to hear. With a PCL sprain, zero practice participation since the injury, and Atlanta’s season “an absolute wash,” there is no logical incentive for the team to put London back on the field for what are essentially meaningless December games. The conclusion there was direct: if you need the roster spot for the fantasy playoffs, you can drop him.That stance lines up with the beat reporting coming out of Atlanta. McElhaney does not believe he plays in Week 15. Morris keeps saying day-to-day, but that has yet to translate into actual work on the field. The team itself has every reason to protect its franchise receiver, get him fully right for 2026, and avoid turning a PCL sprain into something worse.Barring a surprise spike in practice participation on Tuesday or Wednesday, London is trending toward another inactive. The Falcons will file two more injury reports before kickoff, but at this point, any practice designation short of “limited” or “full” would only confirm what the last month has already told us.For Atlanta, that means another game without the player who best stretches the field and bails out the quarterback in tight windows. For fantasy managers, it probably means facing the most important weeks of the season without the player they drafted to carry their WR room.Week 15 may give us the final word on London’s status for the rest of the year. Right now, all the evidence says the same thing. The tag might be “day-to-day,” but the situation is much closer to “see you in 2026.”
Article Summary: Drake london remains day-to-day with a pcl sprain as the falcons enter week 15 on a short week. He hurt it in overtime in week 11 against carolina after posting seven catches for 119 yards. Head coach raheem morris has tried to keep the language positive. Falcons wide receiver darnell mooney has slid into the wr1 role by default.

Article Title: Rudy Gobert’s costly ejection leaves Timberwolves reeling in narrow loss to Suns
Article Text:
Stephen Maturen (Image via Getty Images)

Rudy Gobert was ejected for a flagrant 2 foul



With Rudy Gobert off the court, Minnesota fought tooth and nail



A game that was supposed to extend Minnesota Timberwolves’ winning streak to 6, instead it served the Wolves with chaos and frustration involving their defensive anchor, Rudy Gobert. His third-quarter ejection became the defining moment of Minnesota’s 105–108 loss to the Phoenix Suns, who were missing Devin Booker, on Monday at the Target Center. This loss, having the home advantage, raised fresh questions about discipline, decision-making, and depth.The turning point arrived in the third quarter with 8:00 left on the game clock, when Phoenix big man Mark Williams attacked the rim while being defended by Rudy Gobert and Julius Randle. Rudy Gobert, late to the play, met him at the basket with a foul that went far beyond a routine contest. He elbowed Williams mid-air, sending the Suns center crashing to the floor, stopping the game as officials and players rushed towards the scene.Rudy Gobert’s decision to foul in that moment, while Mark Williams was already in the air and driving, just wasn’t a smart call. It was a dangerous situation that could’ve ended badly, and the officials clearly saw it the same way.They reviewed the play and swiftly determined that it satisfied the criteria for a flagrant 2. Gobert was ejected, overwriting what had been one of his strongest starts in recent weeks: 15 points, eight rebounds, and the kind of interior presence Minnesota leans on heavily.Tyler Ford, the match official, while announcing the decision said, "There is wind-up and significant impact to the ribs of Williams, who is airborne and a vulnerable player with a high potential for injury. That contact is both unnecessary and excessive."For the Suns, Williams bounced back with poise, shaking off the fall and turning in one of the most impressive performances of his young career, including his first-ever made three-pointer on the way to 22 points.But for all the individual brilliance, the Wolves couldn’t overcome the absence of their defensive anchor. Anthony Edwards , when asked how the Wolves can make up for Rudy Gobert’s absence, said, “You can’t make up for Rudy’s absence, when he’s in the game it’s like they don’t want to go down there and finish. So of course he’s truly missed when he’s not on the court.”Even with Gobert gone, Minnesota fought hard to keep its streak alive. Anthony Edwards delivered an electrifying 40-point outing, cruising through defenders with confidence and keeping the Wolves within reach until the final minutes. Julius Randle added 21 points and eight assists, showcasing a strong all-around performance.The Minnesota Timberwolves (15-9) need to buckle up as they are traveling to San Francisco next to meet the Golden State Warriors (13-12) before heading home for a five-game stand that stretches toward late December. With the Western Conference tightening, Minnesota will need to regroup quickly and ensure discipline doesn’t become its undoing again.Also Read: “I've wanted to punch them”: Stephen Curry’s wife Ayesha Curry opens up about the anger she feels when wo
Article Summary: Rudy gobert was ejected for a flagrant 2 foul on phoenix suns' mark williams in the third quarter. Gobert elbowed williams mid-air, sending the suns center crashing to the floor. The wolves lost 105-108 to the suns at the target center.

Article Title: “UFC knows about it”: Khamzat Chimaev questions Alex Pereira’s intentions after title win and unanswered fight callout
Article Text:
“UFC knows about it”: Khamzat Chimaev questions Alex Pereira’s intentions after title win and unanswered fight callout (Image Via Getty)

Why did Khamzat Chimaev criticize Alex Pereira after UFC title win

Khamzat Chimaev has once again spoken openly about a possible fight with Alex Pereira. The undefeated UFC contender believes the fight is not happening because neither Pereira nor the UFC truly want it. Chimaev shared his views during a recent interview with ESPN MMA, where he questioned Pereira’s intentions and the promotion’s decision-making.Alex Pereira, the current UFC light heavyweight champion, reclaimed his title in October at UFC 320 with a first-round knockout win over Magomed Ankalaev. Soon after that win, Khamzat Chimaev called him out for a high-profile fight. While fans showed interest, the matchup has not moved forward.After UFC 320, held in October 2024, Khamzat Chimaev publicly challenged Alex Pereira. Pereira knocked Magomed Ankalaev out in the opening round to reclaim the UFC light heavyweight title.Chimaev went on social media and challenged Pereira to a match after the fight, even advocating a heavyweight fight.Later, Alex Pereira set requirements for the match, which Chimaev claimed he agreed to. Still, no deal followed.Speaking to ESPN MMA in a recent interview released this week, Chimaev claimed the UFC does not want to make the fight happen.“Good fight for me. Everyone knows that,” Khamzat Chimaev said. “UFC knows that, but UFC doesn’t want to give this guy to me.”He also pushed back on Pereira’s comments about fame and popularity. Chimaev said his social media reach proves fans want to see him fight, not talk.Chimaev added that he feels Pereira is avoiding him. “I don’t think he wants that fight,” Chimaev said. “He knows about it, and UFC knows about it.”Chimaev has previously mentioned wanting to fight Alex Pereira. Chimaev expressed his candid perspective on the battle during an interview last year with ex-UFC middleweight champion Michael Bisping.In 2024, Chimaev was interviewed while still competing at the highest level across disciplines. Because of styles, Chimaev stated the battle would be simpler for him than others.However, he did not dismiss Pereira’s power.“I know the guy can knock me out,” Chimaev said. “He is one of the best strikers and hardest punchers.” Chimaev explained that his advantage would come from wrestling and grappling.He believes his ground skills set him apart. At the same time, he admitted respect for Pereira’s striking ability, calling it elite.For now, the fight remains uncertain. Alex Pereira continues his reign at light heavyweight, while Khamzat Chimaev waits for clarity.Fans continue to discuss the matchup online, but according to Chimaev, the final call rests with the UFC.Also Read: “That’s A Heavy Punchy Man”: Conor McGregor Raises Safety Concerns For Jake Paul Before Facing Dangerous Anthony Joshua In Boxing
Article Summary: Khamzat chimaev has spoken openly about a possible fight with alex pereira. The undefeated ufc contender believes the fight is not happening because neither pereira nor the ufc truly want it. Pereira reclaimed the ufc light heavyweight title in october with a first-round knockout.

Article Title: Andy Roddick and Brooklyn Decker combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, family life, career, business, and more
Article Text:
Andy Roddick and Brooklyn Decker combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, family life, career, business, and more (Image via Getty)

Andy Roddick tennis career and earnings legacy

Brooklyn Decker modeling and acting career success

Andy Roddick and Brooklyn Decker family life today





Andy Roddick and Brooklyn Decker business ventures and net worth in 2025

Andy Roddick and Brooklyn Decker are one of the most popular celebrity couples in the United States. Andy is a former world No. 1 tennis player, while Brooklyn is a successful model and actress. Over the years, both built strong careers and made smart money choices. As of 2025, their combined net worth is estimated to be around $80 million, based on data from reliable sources like Celebrity Net Worth, Forbes profiles, and public business records.Andy Roddick had one of the most successful American tennis careers of his generation. He won the 2003 US Open, defeating Juan Carlos Ferrero, according to ATP Tour records. He later reached world No. 1 and stayed inside the top rankings for many years.Andy Roddick played in multiple Grand Slam finals and was known for his powerful serve. He retired from professional tennis in 2012. During his career, he earned millions from prize money and endorsements with major sports brands. These earnings laid the foundation for his long-term wealth.Brooklyn Decker became famous after appearing in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue, which helped her rise quickly in the fashion world.She later moved into acting and starred in movies like Just Go With It and TV shows such as Grace and Frankie.According to entertainment industry reports, Brooklyn continues to work through acting roles, modeling projects, and brand partnerships. In 2025, she remained in the public eye by attending entertainment events and supporting creative projects, showing she is still active in Hollywood.Andy Roddick and Brooklyn Decker got married in 2009, a fact confirmed by long-standing media coverage. The couple has two children and puts strong focus on family life.In recent years, they moved from Austin, Texas, to North Carolina, choosing a calmer setting for raising their kids. Brooklyn Decker has spoken in interviews about parenting and family balance, while Andy also prioritizes time at home along with his business and charity work.After retiring from tennis, Andy Roddick became an active investor. Public interviews and business reports show he invested in sports technology, media companies, real estate, and health-related startups. He is also involved in tennis commentary and podcast work. Brooklyn Decker earns through acting, modeling, and long-term brand deals.Together, these income streams bring their combined net worth to about $80 million in 2025. Andy Roddick also runs the Andy Roddick Foundation, which has raised nearly $40 million to support after-school programs for children from low-income families, based on official foundation disclosures. Their success comes from talent, smart planning, and steady work over many years.Also Read: Anna Kournikova And Enrique Iglesias Combined Net Worth In 2025: Tennis Career, Music Earnings, Endorsements, Business And More
Article Summary: Andy roddick and brooklyn decker are one of the most popular celebrity couples in the united states. Andy is a former world no. 1 tennis player, while brooklyn is a successful model and actress. As of 2025, their combined net worth is estimated to be around $80 million.

Article Title: Anthony Richardson injury update: Indianapolis Colts break silence on QB's status for Seahawks matchup amid tough stretch
Article Text:
Anthony Richardson suffered a shocking accident.(Image via Michael Hickey/Getty Images)

Indianapolis Colts head coach opens up about Anthony Richardson's possible return timeline and recovery



The Indianapolis Colts are facing a tough time as Anthony Richardson and Daniel Jones remain absent



Anthony Richardson, the Indianapolis Colts’ star player, suffered a brutal injury to his eye during one of the pre games warmups and has been away from the field for a long time.With the Indianapolis Colts losing Daniel Jones to his torn Achilles, the team’s head coach, Shane Steichen, shared an update on Anthony Richardson’s return to the field.A few hours ago, the Indianapolis Colts’ head coach, Shane Steichen, opened up on Anthony Richardson’s orbital bone fracture and said, "Any time you're dealing with an eye, you want to make sure he's got full vision in that eye…”The team’s head coach added, “He's resting it right now, and once he's cleared to go, I'll let you guys know."Shane Steichen also confirmed that Anthony Richardson will not be returning to the field this week as the Indianapolis Colts gear up to face the Seattle Seahawks on Sunday night.The Indianapolis Colts’ head coach, Shane Steichen, “He won't be this week…He's still working through. Obviously, it's an eye; it's very delicate, and so he's just resting it, and once the doctors and trainers clear him to be activated."For the unversed, Anthony Richardson experienced a shocking accident earlier in the season prior to a game, when a pole attached to a stretch band snapped and hurt the player around his eye.The accident sparked panic among fans as Anthony Richardson looked visibly in pain. While last week, the team had confirmed that they were “hopeful” of his return in the season, it seems he is still recovering.The Indianapolis Colts have had a pretty strong start to the season as the team has managed to win eight out of the eleven matches played so far.However, as the team has lost Daniel Jones to his torn Achilles which has probably ended the season for him and rookie Riley Leonard suffering a knee injury, the team is facing a pretty tough road ahead.The Indianapolis Colts are also experiencing a losing streak after the team ended up losing the last three matches against the Kansas City Chiefs, the Houston Texans and the Jacksonville Jaguars.Also Read: Trey Benson injury update: Insider hints at a possible setback as the Cardinals stay quiet ahead of the Texans matchup
Article Summary: Indianapolis colts head coach opens up about anthony richardson's possible return timeline and recovery process. Shane steichen also confirmed that anthony richardson will not be returning to the field this week as the indianapolis colts gear up to face the seattle seahawks on sunday night.

Article Title: A’ja Wilson and Bam Adebayo dating timeline: WNBA star hints at her romantic future with NBA big man after TIME honor
Article Text:
A'ja Wilson and Bam Adebayo are a star basketball couple (Image via Getty Images)

Inside A’ja Wilson and Bam Adebayo’s relationship as the WNBA star gushes about her loving four-year bond with her partner

Bam Adebayo opens up about his deep, inspiring bond with A’ja Wilson in touching interview

Ohhhhh. I hate this!

On Tuesday, Time magazine named A'ja Wilson their Athlete of the Year for 2025. The historic award comes after Wilson had another outstanding season for the Las Vegas Aces. She was the WNBA's first four-time MVP and split Defensive Player of the Year honors with Minnesota's Alanna Smith.The WNBA superstar supposedly has it all. She's won WNBA championships, MVP awards, and a Nike contract, and she's now looking forward to starting a family with her NBA partner Bam Adebayo. After being voted Time magazine's Athlete of the Year for 2025, she announced in an interview with the magazine that she wants to have children with Adebayo, whom she has been seeing since 2021.The Las Vegas Aces star told TIME magazine about her romance with the Miami Heat guard, revealing that she and Adebayo have been together for four years. During the interview, Wilson was asked about having children together. She said:"That is always a dream. This is my life partner. Honestly, what on earth was my world before you? That’s how much he’s impacted my life."When asked about getting married, Wilson responded that Adebayo will make all marriage decisions and that fans will see the ring on her finger when the time comes. Adebayo said:"Y’all will know, because people are nosy and they’ll look at her hands.. There you go."Wilson and Adebayo have been dating since 2021. Before the 2024 Summer Olympics, the Miami Heat player and WNBA MVP were pictured together, sparking relationship suspicions.Wilson quietly exposed their affair at NBA All-Star Weekend in February 2025, after months of silence. Furthermore, the couple largely avoids social media and keeps their relationship private.Wilson's alma mater, the University of South Carolina, acknowledged her with a jersey retirement that same month. The Las Vegas Aces player subtly mentioned Adebayo, who was there courtside, in her comments.For years, the two have openly supported each other in their games and remained friends. Following A'ja's WNBA single-season scoring record, Bam expressed her admiration for her on social media by tweeting "U'nanimous" with an apostrophe, just like her first name.After months of dating rumors, Wilson secretly announced her relationship to PEOPLE in February 2025 while discussing her Valentine's Day plans at NBA All-Star Weekend. According to images obtained by TMZ, the couple was photographed on a dinner date in Los Angeles a month previously. They are still together and strong, and they just celebrated another milestone in their relationship when Bam witnessed Wilson make WNBA history.Adebayo, a three-time NBA All-Star, did not provide a date for anything, but he told Time that he shares Wilson's aspirations and appreciates how they support one another. Adebayo considers Wilson his best friend and said:"As the young people say, that’s ‘twin’... That’s what makes it so great. We’re striving for the same thing. We want each other to be better. We want to make it easier on one another, and we want to do this together. She’s a strong Black woman, man, and she does it with so much grace and positivity."He continued:“The best thing about our relationship, we started out as great friends.. We didn’t just jump to, ‘Hey, what’s up? You and I will make a great thing.’ Nah, we really eased into this.. We’re still trying to figure this out.. and the last thing I need is BalloonBoy1817 being like,When the subject of marriage came up, Wilson jokingly posed the question to Adebayo. Adebayo hinted about their timetable in the same interview. Additionally, they also haven’t said anything about a proposal.Also read: Bam Adebayo stuns girlfriend A’ja Wilson with emotional surprise as she makes WNBA history with 4th MVP award
Article Summary: A'ja wilson was named time magazine's athlete of the year for 2025. The las vegas aces star and miami heat guard bam adebayo have been together for four years. Wilson announced their relationship in february 2025 while discussing her valentine's day plans at nba all-star weekend.

Article Title: Roger Federer and Mirka Federer combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, family life, career, and business
Article Text:
Roger Federer and Mirka Federer combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, family life, career, and business (Image via Getty)

Roger Federer net worth in 2025 and how he built his wealth



Mirka Federer net worth and her role in Roger Federer’s success



Roger Federer and Mirka Federer family life and children

Roger Federer career legacy, retirement, and life in 2025

Roger Federer is one of the biggest names in sports history. In 2025, the Swiss tennis legend is widely reported to be a billionaire. His money comes from tennis winnings, big brand deals, and smart business choices. His wife, Mirka Federer, has been by his side through every stage of his journey. Together, they have built a strong family, a global brand, and huge wealth that continues to grow even after retirement.Roger Federer’s net worth in 2025 is estimated between $1.1 billion and $1.3 billion, according to Forbes and Bloomberg. During his tennis career, Roger Federer earned about $130 million in official prize money from tournaments.However, most of his wealth came after tennis. His lifetime endorsement deal with Uniqlo, signed in 2018, is worth around $300 million. He also has long-standing partnerships with Rolex, Credit Suisse, and Wilson.One of his smartest moves was investing in the Swiss sports shoe company On in 2019. The brand grew fast, and its public listing added hundreds of millions to Federer’s value. This investment played a major role in his billionaire status.Mirka Federer, born Miroslava Vavrinec, is a former professional tennis player who represented Switzerland. She retired early due to injury but stayed deeply involved in tennis through Roger Federer’s career.Mirka Federer is known to manage travel, scheduling, and family decisions. While her personal net worth is not publicly listed, all major reports agree that the couple manages finances together. She is also involved in Roger Federer’s brand image and business direction.For many years, Mirka Federer was seen courtside at every match, playing a quiet but powerful role behind one of the greatest careers in sports.Roger Federer and Mirka Federer married in 2009. They have four children, two sets of twins. Their twin daughters, Myla Rose and Charlene Riva, were born in 2009. Their twin sons, Leo and Lenny, were born in 2014.The family lives mainly in Switzerland and values privacy. Since retiring in 2022, Roger Federer has said family time is his top priority. He often shares small moments from family trips and daily life but keeps his children away from heavy media attention.Roger Federer won 20 Grand Slam titles, including eight Wimbledon titles, the most in men’s tennis history. He spent 310 weeks as world No. 1, a record held for many years. He officially retired from tennis in 2022.In 2025, Roger Federer stays active through business, charity, and various tennis events. He was recently seen at Wimbledon events and charity matches, but he has clearly stated there is no comeback planned. His Roger Federer Foundation continues to support children’s education in Africa and Switzerland.Also Read: Who Is Roger Federer's Wife Mirka Federer? All About Their Relationship, Family, Children, And Life Beyond Tennis
Article Summary: Roger federer is widely reported to be a billionaire in 2025. His money comes from tennis winnings, big brand deals, and smart business choices. His wife, mirka federer, has been by his side through every stage of his journey. Together, they have built a strong family, a global brand, and huge wealth.

Article Title: "A loser": Zack Peter tears into Meghan Markle’s Netflix holiday special with blunt criticism
Article Text:
Meghan Markle's new Netflix holiday special, "With Love, Meghan: Holiday Celebration," has drawn criticism for its perceived lack of purpose and uninspired execution. Blogger Zack Peter led the backlash, questioning the show's value and Markle's talent. While some viewers find the content warm and cozy, critics argue the lifestyle inspiration falls flat, despite the show generating significant discussion.

Critics question purpose, execution, and Meghan Markle’s presence on her own show

Zack Peter DRAGS Meghan Markle’s Christmas Special: “She’s Just… Not That Bright” | DLIS





Meghan Markle’s latest Netflix project, With Love, Meghan: Holiday Celebration, arrived with cozy intentions; festive recipes, warm conversation, and a dose of lifestyle inspiration from the Duchess of Sussex. But instead of being greeted with holiday cheer, the special has become a new target for online commentators who question whether the series has any meaningful value.While Markle’s cooking-and-chat format aims to show a more relatable side of her life, critics argue the execution feels confused and uninspired. One of the loudest voices in the backlash is blogger and podcaster Zack Peter, who didn’t hold back during an appearance on Don’t Let It Stu, hosted by Chef Stuart O’Keeffe.Peter slammed the show for lacking purpose, delivering one of the harshest critiques yet. “Like I just, I don't understand the value of this show. I don't get it. Who is watching it? Why are you watching it?” he said before moving into a fiery assessment of Markle herself.“It's not like you're watching it because she's pretty. It's not like you're watching it because she's talented. It's not like you're watching it because you're really learning anything.It's like, why are we watching this show? What are you selling me? A jam?” He went on to call Markle “a f**king loser,” a comment that has since circulated heavily online.Peter and O’Keeffe then mocked moments from the episode, especially Meghan reacting to her own ingredients as though she was reading them for the first time. O’Keeffe joked, “And then she’s like, and so there’s 2 cups of powdered sugar. Wow. That's a lot of sugar.” Peter responded with equal sarcasm: “You don't even know what we're f**king making. Why am I here?”Not all reactions have been hostile. Italian chef Francesco Mazzei recently weighed in on Talking Royals, suggesting Meghan’s recipes might still produce great food, even if her technique is questionable. He admitted, “I don't think so,” when asked if he enjoyed her show, but added, “maybe she did an amazing dish.”Despite the backlash, some viewers say the special feels “warm and cosy,” proving that Meghan’s lifestyle approach may appeal more as comfort content than culinary instruction. Whether critics like it or not, Markle’s holiday show has clearly achieved one goal, everyone is talking about it.Also Read: "A MAGA": Perez Hilton calls out Sydney Sweeney’s 'new stance' as she finally addresses American Eagle ad outrage
Article Summary: Meghan markle's new netflix holiday special, "with love, meghan: holiday celebration," has drawn criticism for its perceived lack of purpose and uninspired execution. Blogger zack peter led the backlash, questioning the show's value and meghan's talent.

Article Title: Shedeur Sanders finally clears the air on viral “thong photo” as brother Shilo demands the real truth
Article Text:
Shedeur Sanders shuts down wild thong accusations (Getty Images)

Shedeur Sanders ends the “thonggate” talk



The Cleveland Browns found themselves at the center of one of the strangest viral moments of the week, and it had nothing to do with playbooks or game plans. Instead, rookie quarterback Shedeur Sanders became the focus of an unexpected debate that spread across social media faster than any highlight. Viewers paused their screens, zoomed in and argued over one simple question: was he wearing a thong under his uniform? The clip dominated timelines, leaving fans confused and amused in equal measure.While the noise grew louder online, Shedeur was shaking off none of it. He had just delivered his strongest performance so far, throwing for 364 yards and three touchdowns in a tough loss to the Titans. His play was so sharp that head coach Kevin Stefanski immediately named him the Browns’ starter for the final four games. Yet even on a night filled with promise, the internet turned its attention to a mystery that only one person could clear up.The answer came straight from a family conversation when his brother, Shilo Sanders, decided to address the topic head-on. Shilo didn’t waste time and asked, “Let's cut to the business, bruh. Did you wear a thong or not?”Shedeur couldn’t help but laugh. He explained, “Come on, bruh… You forgot I had a little back injury, right? So I get my back taped.But that is crazy that it did look like that. That's funny, though.” For anyone still unsure, he added one final line: “Yes, bro. There's not no thong, bruh. That’s just weird.”With that, the mystery turned out to be nothing more than medical tape. The rookie later posted “Yall trippin” on Instagram, a short message that captured his disbelief at how quickly the story blew up.Still, the moment offered a glimpse into how fast a sideline clip can become a cultural topic. Fans joked about rookie hazing, theories piled up and memes flooded feeds. Through it all, Shedeur stayed focused on football, not fashion.Now that “thonggate” is settled, Sanders and his taped-up back head into their next challenge against the Chicago Bears, hoping the conversation shifts back to the one thing he controls: his performance on the field.Also Read: Drake Maye’s wife Ann trades “Bakemas” videos for unforgettable glam moment at Patriots’ big holiday gathering
Article Summary: Cleveland browns quarterback shedeur sanders was the focus of an unexpected debate. Viewers argued over whether he was wearing a thong under his uniform. The answer came straight from a family conversation when his brother, shilo sanders, decided to address the topic.

Article Title: Drake Maye’s wife Ann trades “Bakemas” videos for unforgettable glam moment at Patriots’ big holiday gathering
Article Text:
Drake Maye’s wife Ann (Instagram)

Ann Michael Maye’s rising influence in New England



Drake Maye’s wife Ann shocks fans with glamorous party look at Patriots’ star-studded New England holiday event (Ann Michael Maye/Instagram)

Ann Michael Maye didn’t plan on slowing down her popular “Bakemas” countdown this week, but she still found time to light up the New England Patriots holiday party. With her husband Drake Maye enjoying a rare break in the schedule, she stepped into the spotlight in a black dress that quickly drew fans’ attention. The celebration brought together the team’s wives and girlfriends, yet Ann Michael stood out with the ease of someone who has already become a favorite among Patriots supporters.Her growing fame has little to do with touchdowns and everything to do with taste. Ann Michael’s TikTok feed has turned into a cozy corner of the internet where butter, chocolate and holiday cheer rule the day. Her daily “Bakemas” posts have turned casual scrollers into loyal viewers. Even Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel took notice, playfully critiquing her treats and admitting she helps keep the offensive linemen fueled. She has earned 2.5 million likes so far, and her comment section fills up the moment she posts.While Drake rested through the team’s bye week, Ann Michael kept working, sharing creations like chocolate peanut butter bars that fans called impossible to resist. Before the Patriots’ last win, she baked Patriots-themed M&M and chocolate chip cookies, and she once joked that Thanksgiving was her “Super Bowl.”Her charm comes from mixing simple recipes with genuine energy. It is the kind of presence that makes people feel like they are part of her kitchen.Her fashion choices have become just as popular. She has stepped into Gillette Stadium wearing head to toe New England blue, surprised everyone with an all red look, and continued the streak at the holiday party with a sleek black fit. Her supporters now watch game days as closely for her outfits as for the scoreboard.Drake and the Patriots host the Buffalo Bills this Sunday. With playoff stakes rising, fans already expect Ann Michael to show up with another look that sparks conversation.The story behind the couple makes her support even sweeter. Drake was a star at North Carolina before becoming the No. 3 pick in the 2024 NFL Draft. Ann Michael attended the same school, and her brother Tad played quarterback alongside Drake. They married on June 21 in North Carolina. Now, in New England, she has become his most loyal fan and an unexpected star in her own right.Also Read: "Hopefully more zeros": Ciara opens up about turning 40, saying she’s “excited” and ready for her “best era yet” and hints at big moves
Article Summary: Ann michael maye is the wife of new england patriots quarterback drake maye. She has become a fan favorite for her daily "bakemas" posts. Her fashion choices have become just as popular as her recipes. The patriots host the buffalo bills on sunday.

Article Title: A’ja Wilson reveals real story behind wearing Thanos’ Infinity Gauntlet during Las Vegas Aces’ title celebration
Article Text:
A’ja Wilson. Image via: Ian Maule/ AP

Why A’ja Wilson chose the Infinity Gauntlet look



A new level of championship energy from A’ja Wilson



A’ja Wilson arrived at the Las Vegas Aces championship parade carrying more than a trophy haul. She walked into Toshiba Plaza with a gold Infinity Gauntlet on her left hand, turning the moment into a bold visual summary of a season that rewrote record books.The accessory captured the scale of her dominance and offered a snapshot of an athlete finally willing to embrace the noise that followed her unmatched run. Every stone represented a milestone, and each one told the league exactly where she now stands.Her celebration quickly became one of the most replayed images from the Aces’ third title run. It stood out because it distilled her year into something fans could instantly understand. A’ja Wilson ruled the moment, collected her achievements at historic speed, and wanted the world to see the truth of her rise. TIME later named her its 2025 Athlete of the Year, and she explainedthe real reason behind wearing the Marvel comic’s villain Thanos’ Gauntlet.Wilson labeled each stone with an honor earned across an unprecedented stretch, starting with her second scoring title, becoming the fastest player in WNBA history to hit 5,000 points, her third Defensive Player of the Year award, a fourth MVP, her second Finals MVP, and a third championship.No player in WNBA or NBA history ever pulled off that full slate in a single season. Even her father, Roscoe, joked about it, saying, “I’m waiting on them to call for the Academy Award and the Emmy. ”The image mattered because Wilson wanted the symbolism to match the reality. Speaking about the choice, she explained, “When you’ve collected everything, that’s Thanos. And this year, I collected everything.” She admitted she rarely leans into self-promotion, preferring her play to take the lead. That changed at the parade. “This was my biggest moment of doing it, because no one’s ever done what I’ve done. And I think people really needed to understand that. ”The moment wasn’t a gimmick. It signaled a superstar stepping into her full power after pushing the Aces through a season that nearly slipped away. Vegas hovered around .500 midseason, then stormed into the playoffs with sixteen straight wins before sweeping Phoenix for another title.TIME’s honor marked her second recognition from the magazine this year, after being named one of its Women of the Year in February.Also Read: "This is my life partner"- A'ja Wilson drops a massive update about her future wedding plans with Bam Adebayo
Article Summary: A'ja wilson wore a gold infinity gauntlet at the las vegas aces championship parade. The accessory captured the scale of her dominance and offered a snapshot of an athlete finally willing to embrace the noise that followed her unmatched run. Time later named her its 2025 athlete of the year.

Article Title: Why did Ronald Acuña Jr name Shohei Ohtani as his favourite player? His honest reply says it all
Article Text:
Why did Ronald Acuña Jr name Shohei Ohtani as his favourite player? His honest reply says it all (Image Via Getty)

Ronald Acuña Jr. explains his admiration for Shohei Ohtani

Ronald Acuña Jr., the Atlanta Braves outfielder, has picked Shohei Ohtani as his favorite athlete. He shared this on December 8, 2025, in a short video clip from MLB Office Hours that Major League Baseball posted on its official Instagram page. The moment was quick but clear. Acuña Jr. did not hesitate, and his answer stood out to fans right away.The question came during a casual chat format. When asked who his favorite athlete is, Ronald Acuña Jr. smiled and said Shohei Ohtani. He also joked that choosing himself did not feel right. The clip spread fast online and sparked conversations among baseball fans who admire both stars.Ronald Acuña Jr. said this during MLB Office Hours, a show where players talk candidly about life in baseball. MLB uploaded the program earlier and later on Instagram.The setting was laid-back, therefore the response seemed real and organic. Playing for the Los Angeles Dodgers, Shohei Ohtani does activities seldom seen in baseball.Top-tier pitcher and excellent hitter, he Including Acuña Jr., players all around the league have come to appreciate that talent set. Acuña Jr. has discussed throughout the years how much he likes Ohtani's play.The two competitors achieved significant objectives in the same season. Ronald Acuña Jr. earned the National League Most Valuable Player award for the Braves in 2023.Shohei Ohtani also won the MVP that year. Their success built mutual respect and elevated them at the top of the sport.Shohei Ohtani's 2024 season for the Dodgers was historical. In a single season, he was the first MLB player ever to steal more than 50 bases and hit more than 50 home runs.That accomplishment changed how fans and players discuss what baseball could be. With speed, power, and enthusiasm, Ronald Acuña Jr. has also helped to define the current game.He continued among the league's most watched players even as he controlled wounds.The two stars have met at league events, including the BBWAA Awards Dinner in New York City in January 2024, where they were seen chatting and laughing.The message is straightforward: Ronald Acuña Jr. calls Shohei Ohtani his favorite athlete. Talent honors talent.For followers, it's yet another reminder that, much as children who enjoy the game, today's greatest baseball stars still respect one another.Also Read: MLB Trade Rumors: Alex Bregman Race Puts Bo Bichette In Play As Blue Jays Eye Tatsuya Imai
Article Summary: Atlanta braves outfielder ronald acuña jr. named shohei ohtani as his favorite athlete. The two stars have met at league events, including the bbwaa awards dinner in new york city in january 2024, where they were seen chatting and laughing. The clip spread fast online and sparked conversations among baseball fans who admire both stars.

Article Title: A’ja Wilson net worth: Las Vegas star’s phenomenal rise lands her TIME’s Athlete of the Year honor
Article Text:
A’ja Wilson is an WNBA star (Image via Getty Images)

A’ja Wilson shines in a dominant year as she earns TIME’s iconic Athlete of the Year honor

A’ja Wilson’s bold interview reveals her confident rise in GOAT talks and WNBA power shift

In 2025, no athlete fared better than Las Vegas Aces standout A'ja Wilson. When her squad needed a spark down the stretch, Wilson delivered. The MVP played like an MVP, leading her club to 16 consecutive victories to end the regular season. A'ja Wilson, the Las Vegas Aces' standout, has been selected TIME's 2025 Athlete of the Year.The magazine named the four-time WNBA MVP and three-time champion on Tuesday. A'ja Wilson's athletic supremacy extends beyond basketball. By being chosen TIME's 2025 Athlete of the Year, the Las Vegas Aces superstar has solidified her position in American sports history, signaling a watershed moment. According to Celebrity Net Worth, Wilson's net worth in 2025 is expected to be $4 million. A big amount of her earnings are from her WNBA salary.Wilson, a seven-time All-Star, won multiple awards this season, including the fastest WNBA player to score 5,000 points, third Defensive Player of the Year, record fourth MVP, and second WNBA Finals MVP.Wilson exemplifies what actor LeBron James called "progress," from her bronze statue at the University of South Carolina, a marker of advancement in a place her grandmother could not have walked freely, to her renowned position as a leader in a quickly rising league "the definition of female Black excellence."A'ja Wilson is establishing a new benchmark rather than merely celebrating an honour. The 2025 Athlete of the Year award is an essential recognition that unshakeable leadership, cultural relevance, and sustained excellence can and should be acknowledged at the highest levels. As a generational icon, she actively works to ensure that she won't be the last to take center stage.A'ja Wilson is a $4 million author and professional basketball player from the United States. Since 2018, A'ja Wilson has been a member of the Las Vegas Aces of the Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA). Wilson, who was selected first overall in the 2018 WNBA Draft, had previously played for the University of South Carolina, where she won three SEC Player of the Year awards for her on-court achievements.In addition to setting WNBA records for most points scored in the first 20 games of the regular season, consecutive regular season games with 20+ points, consecutive regular season games with 25+ points, consecutive regular season games with 20+ points and 8+ rebounds, and single-game and single-season point leaders, she has been the Aces' all-time leader in points and rebounds.She competed for teams that won gold in the World Cup in 2018 and 2022 as well as the Olympic Games in 2020 and 2024. In addition to publishing the "New York Times" bestseller "Dear Black Girls" in 2024, A'ja starred in the 2021 movie "Space Jam: A New Legacy." She has endorsement agreements with brands like Mountain Dew, Ruffles, Gatorade, and Nike.She is the only player in the NBA and WNBA to win a championship and be awarded Defensive Player of the Year, Finals MVP, and regular-season MVP all in one season."I think I'm on my way there," she told TIME about the "greatest of all time" discussions. "I'm making it real hard for people to chase after me. That's what it means to be the GOAT."In her interview with TIME, Wilson discussed a number of subjects, such as growing up in South Carolina, overcoming the Aces' sluggish start to the regular season, and the WNBA's future in light of recent collective bargaining negotiations and the league's rising stature."All of us are going to be at the table," she said about labor negotiations, "and we're not moving until we get exactly what we want."Wilson's impact, however, goes well beyond the statistics. The WNBA was founded on the backs of a player base that was predominately Black, and this honour acknowledges that foundation. Wilson's dominance in 2025 offered indisputable evidence of the league's established, elite talent, following a difficult, occasionally racially controversial storyline around the league's growing popularity in 2024.Also read: A’ja Wilson makes history with fourth MVP, shattering unmatched WNBA records
Article Summary: A'ja wilson, the las vegas aces' standout, has been selected time's 2025 athlete of the year. The magazine named the four-time wnba mvp and three-time champion on tuesday. According to celebrity net worth, wilson's net worth in 2025 is expected to be $4 million. She has endorsement agreements with brands like mountain dew, ruffles, gatorade, and nike.
